variables.desc: The Bally Astrocade is a second-generation home video game console that was released by Bally Manufacturing Corporation in 1977. It is known for its unique design, which includes a built-in keyboard and a calculator function. The Astrocade was not a commercial success, but it is considered to be an important part of computer history.
